title: Nitrux 3.0 Arrives with Improvements to Boot, Installation, and Upgrade
description:
Systemd-free and immutable distro Nitrux 3.0 is now available for download powered by Linux kernel 6.4.12 and KDE Plasma 5.27.7 LTS.

The post Nitrux 3.0 Arrives with Improvements to Boot, Installation, and Upgrade appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
